text: Is there a way to determine if a function call caused a certain method to be called? For a test case I want to make sure that certain plotting commands hit specific backend functions

elements.text: Is there a way to determine if a function call caused a certain method to be called? For a test case I want to make sure that certain plotting commands hit specific backend functions

text: I don't think there is without some sort of instrumenting (via Cassette or otherwise).

elements.text: I don't think there is without some sort of instrumenting (via Cassette or otherwise).

text: If you don't have dynamic dispatch then you can probably get the info you need via `code_typed` (basically like what Cthulhu.jl does)
